ğŸ¤”æ€è·¯ï¼ˆå®š-å¤š-æŒ‘-ä¿®-è¿ï¼‰

For studying, a mobile phone is a mixed blessing.
All things considered,I hold the opinion that the benefits of a mobile phone justify the costs.
When it comes to mobile phones, it is well known that they are an important learning tool in modern society.
To begin with(è¿æ¥è¯), the leading cause is that there are many free learning applications on it,
and it can account for why mobile phones can help students study.
Meanwhile(è¿æ¥è¯), mobile phones go some way towards acquiring knowledge at a fast clip.
But(è¿æ¥è¯), there are too many games on the phone.(ç”¨çŸ­å¥å­è¿æ¥)
If we turn a blind eye to this issue, it is very likely that mobile phones will take up a lot of our study time.

æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸Šæ‰€è®¨è®ºçš„æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¸éš¾å¾—å‡ºç»“è®ºï¼šæ‰‹æœºå¯¹å­¦ä¹ æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œä½†æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿåº”è¯¥è­¦æƒ•æ‰‹æœºä¸Šè¿‡å¤šçš„å¨±ä¹åŠŸèƒ½å¸¦æ¥çš„å½±å“ã€‚
Judging by what is discussed above, it is not difficult to draw the conclusion that mobile phones are helpful for learning, but we should also guard against the impact of too many entertainment functions on mobile phones.
æœ€æ˜¾è€Œæ˜“è§çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ä¸è¦åœ¨æ‰‹æœºä¸Šè£…è¿‡å¤šçš„å¨±ä¹ç±»åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯æ¸¸æˆã€‚
The most obvious way forward would be not to install too many entertainment apps on mobile phones, especially games.
æ€»çš„æ¥è¯´ï¼Œæˆ‘éå¸¸ç›¸ä¿¡è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤šäººä¼šæ¥å—æ‰‹æœºç»™å­¦ä¹ å¸¦æ¥çš„ä»·å€¼ã€‚
On the whole, I do believe that an increasing number of people will embrace the value of mobile phones for learning.

æ­¤åˆ»ï¼Œæˆ‘çªç„¶æ„è¯†åˆ°ï¼Œæ‰‹æœºçš„åˆ©å¼Šå–å†³äºä½¿ç”¨è€…çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ã€‚
Now, it suddenly dawns on me that the pros and cons of mobile phones depend on the way that users use them.

The number of Chinaâ€™s urban population climbed from 300 million to 666 million rapidly between 1990 and 2010.

There was a rapid upward tendency in the number of Chinaâ€™s urban population from 300 million to 666 million between 1990 and 2010.
The time between 1990 and 2010 saw a rapid upward tendency from 300 million to 666 million in the number of Chinaâ€˜s urban population.

For studying, a mobile phone is a mixed blessing.
All things considered,I hold the opinion that the benefits of a mobile phone justify the costs.
When it comes to mobile phones, it is well known that they are an important learning tool in modern society.
To begin with(è¿æ¥è¯), the leading cause is that there are many free learning applications on it,
and it can account for why mobile phones can help students study.
Meanwhile(è¿æ¥è¯), mobile phones go some way towards acquiring knowledge at a fast clip.
But(è¿æ¥è¯), there are too many games on the phone.(ç”¨çŸ­å¥å­è¿æ¥)
If we turn a blind eye to this issue, it is very likely that mobile phones will take up a lot of our study time.

èŒƒæ–‡

èŒƒæ–‡1 é“æ­‰ä¿¡

é¢˜ç›®ï¼š å‡å¦‚ä½ æ˜¯ Li Mingï¼ŒåŸæœ¬çº¦å¥½å’ŒåŒäº‹ Smith æ˜æ™šå»ä»–å®¶å»çœ‹è¶³çƒæ¯”èµ›ï¼Œä½†ä½ çªç„¶æ¥åˆ°å…¬å¸çš„ç”µè¯ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½ æ˜å¤©å›å…¬å¸æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä»½æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚è¯·å†™å°é‚®ä»¶ï¼ˆe-mailï¼‰å‘ Smith è‡´æ­‰ã€‚

Dear Smith,
I am writing this email to apologize for not coming to your house to watch the World Cup tomorrow night and to express my guilt.
Specifically, my ideas with regard to this matter are as follows. To begin with, I just received a call from my company asking me to go back to receive an important document as soon as possible, which forced me to rush back to the company. Secondly, the game will be replayed in your favorite bar the day after tomorrow. Consequently, I would like to invite you to the bar the day after tomorrow to watch the match with a drink.
I am grateful for your time and patience. I am looking forward to your prompt response.
å¥å°¾ Yours sincerely,
å¥å°¾ Li Ming

èŒƒæ–‡2 Notice

Notice
å¥å°¾ December 30th. 2022
In order to improve the experience of using the swimming pool, we have intended to close it temporarily.
Specifically, reasons abounding for closing the pool are as follows. To begin with, we plan to replace the air conditioning in the pool, and it will enable the pool to operate normally in the cold winter. Secondly, many students suggest that some washing devices should be added. And we really agree with that advice. Consequently, we are going to build a new area for washing.
Please pay much attention to this notice. For more detailed information, you can contact the swimming pool.
å¥å°¾ The School Swimming Pool

If you look hard enough, you will find that traffic congestion has a far-reaching impact on our daily life.
Two reasons can bear this out.
The leading cause is that more and more people can afford private cars with the rise of living standards,
and it can account for why there are more and more cars on the road.
Secondly, when it comes to traffic jams, it is well known that the inconvenience of public transport is also an important factor.
And it can boil down to the economic and management level of the city.
Without doubt, this will exert an undesirable effect on the traffic in the city.

Judging by what is discussed above, it is not difficult to draw the conclusion that we should find ways to alleviate traffic congestion.
What is to be done?
Pretty much everyone agrees on the prescription that we should develop intelligent transportation vigorously and improve the level of urban traffic management.

å¥åº·é¥®é£Ÿ

å¦‚æœä½ è§‚å¯Ÿçš„â¾œå¤Ÿä»”ç»†ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç°å¥åº·é¥®â»å¯¹æˆ‘ä»¬çš„â¼ˆâ½£æœ‰æ·±è¿œå½±å“ã€‚ä¸¤ç‚¹åŸå› å¯ä»¥è§£é‡Šã€‚â¾¸è¦åŸå› æ˜¯å®ƒå¯ä»¥è®©æˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰æ›´å¥½çš„ç²¾â¼’ï¼Œâ½½è¿™èƒ½è§£é‡Šä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆç²¾è‹±â¼ˆç¾¤æ›´é‡è§†å¥åº·é¥®â»ã€‚å…¶æ¬¡ï¼Œå½“æåŠå¥åº·é¥®â»æ—¶ï¼Œä¼—æ‰€å‘¨çŸ¥çš„æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬åº”è¯¥å‡å°‘è„‚è‚ªå’Œç³–ç±»çš„æ‘„â¼Šã€‚â½½è¿™å¯ä»¥å½’ç»“äºé‚£äº›ç”±ä¸å¥åº·çš„é¥®â»â½…å¼å¯¼è‡´çš„è‚¥èƒ–é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ¯«â½†ç–‘é—®ï¼Œè¿™å°†å¯¹ä¸ªâ¼ˆå¥åº·äº§â½£ä¸åˆ©çš„å½±å“ã€‚
æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸Šæ‰€è®¨è®ºçš„æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¸éš¾å¾—å‡ºç»“è®ºï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬åº”è¯¥é‡è§†å¥åº·é¥®â»ã€‚åº”è¯¥æ€ä¹ˆåŠå‘¢ï¼Ÿ å¾ˆå¤šâ¼ˆéƒ½èµæˆè¿™â¼€â½…æ¡ˆï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬åº”å½“æ§åˆ¶æ¯é¡¿é¥­çš„åˆ†é‡ï¼Œä¸èƒ½æš´é¥®æš´â»ï¼Œå¤šåƒâ½”æœè”¬èœä»¥åŠâ»¥ç±»ã€‚

If you look hard enough, you will find that a healthy diet has a profound impact on our lives.
Two reasons can bear this out.
The leading cause is that such a diet can make us have better energyï¼Œ
and it can account for why the elite attach more importance to healthy eating.
Secondly, when it comes to healthy eatingï¼Œit is well known that we should reduce the intake of fats and sugars.
And it can boil down to obesity caused by unhealthy diets.
Without doubt, this will exert an adverse effect on personal health.

Judging by what is discussed above, it is not difficult to draw the conclusion that we should lay emphasis on healthy eating.
What is to be done?
Pretty much everyone agrees on the prescription that we should control the amount of each meal and do not eat and drink too much.
